trans-unit.source: Getting started, What next
trans-unit.target: Getting started, What next

trans-unit.source: With this basic information, you can now start writing more interesting Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps.
trans-unit.target: With this basic information, you can now start writing more interesting Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps.

trans-unit.source: Getting started: What next?
trans-unit.target: Getting started: What next?

trans-unit.source: \[ Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.
trans-unit.target: \[ Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.

trans-unit.source: For Windows 8.x articles, see the [archive](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=619132) \]
trans-unit.target: For Windows 8.x articles, see the [archive](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=619132) \]

trans-unit.source: Next steps
trans-unit.target: Next steps

trans-unit.source: With this basic information, you can now start writing more interesting Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps.
trans-unit.target: With this basic information, you can now start writing more interesting Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps.

trans-unit.source: For your next steps, have a read through the following topics, and then fire up Microsoft Visual Studio and start writing some code!
trans-unit.target: For your next steps, have a read through the following topics, and then fire up Microsoft Visual Studio and start writing some code!

trans-unit.source: [App contracts and extensions](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/hh464906): How to declare agreements between your apps and other apps and Windows, for example, the Play To contract and the Game Explorer extension.
trans-unit.target: [App contracts and extensions](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/hh464906): How to declare agreements between your apps and other apps and Windows, for example, the Play To contract and the Game Explorer extension.

trans-unit.source: [Working with tiles, badges, and toast notifications](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/xaml/hh868259): How to create tiles, update tiles and their badges, send toast notifications, and show and update tile and badge updates on the lock screen.
trans-unit.target: [Working with tiles, badges, and toast notifications](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/xaml/hh868259): How to create tiles, update tiles and their badges, send toast notifications, and show and update tile and badge updates on the lock screen.

trans-unit.source: [Launching, resuming, and multitasking](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/hh770837): How to auto-launch, activate, suspend, and resume apps, and how to work with background tasks.
trans-unit.target: [Launching, resuming, and multitasking](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/hh770837): How to auto-launch, activate, suspend, and resume apps, and how to work with background tasks.

trans-unit.source: [Guidelines for roaming application data](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/hh465094): How to provide a great end-user experience for apps where the user utilizes more than one device, such as a PC at work and a tablet at home.
trans-unit.target: [Guidelines for roaming application data](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/hh465094): How to provide a great end-user experience for apps where the user utilizes more than one device, such as a PC at work and a tablet at home.

trans-unit.source: [Create your first Windows Runtime app using C# or Visual Basic](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=394138): A topic focusing on Windows Phone development.
trans-unit.target: [Create your first Windows Runtime app using C# or Visual Basic](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=394138): A topic focusing on Windows Phone development.

trans-unit.source: [Videos for iOS and Android devs](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn393982): Some more help, this time in visual format.
trans-unit.target: [Videos for iOS and Android devs](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn393982): Some more help, this time in visual format.

trans-unit.source: Also, be sure to visit our [Community resources](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=263513) to learn how to get help and get connected through developer forums, blogs, developer camps and workshops, and local Microsoft events and contacts.
trans-unit.target: Also, be sure to visit our [Community resources](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=263513) to learn how to get help and get connected through developer forums, blogs, developer camps and workshops, and local Microsoft events and contacts.

trans-unit.source: We think that Windows 10 will open up new app-building opportunities for you.
trans-unit.target: We think that Windows 10 will open up new app-building opportunities for you.

trans-unit.source: We look forward to seeing all of the great apps that you're going to build!
trans-unit.target: We look forward to seeing all of the great apps that you're going to build!
